Valentine Ozornwafor (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1999) bụ onye Naijiria n'agba bọọlụ nke na-agbachitere ndị otu Ligue 2 Sochaux na mgbazinye site na Sporting Charleroi.

A mụrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Ozonwafor sonyeere Enyimba na 2017, mgbe ọ masịrị ya mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu maka otu mpaghara na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide klọb ahụ. O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 3 Machị, na 0-0 na-aga n'ihu megide Bendel Insurance, wee gbaa egwuregwu nke abụọ ya na 17 Machị, n'egwuregwu na Sunshine Stars maka otu akara ahụ.
Na 28 June 2019, a mara ọkwa na Ozornwafor bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ na Galatasaray, maka ego a na-ekwu na ọ bụ € 300,000.

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, ọ sonyeere klọb Spanish UD Almería na mgbazinye maka oge 2019-20. Ozornwafor mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na 6 Ọktoba 2019, na-abịa dị ka onye nọchiri Jonathan na ọkara nke abụọ na 010 na-aga n'ihu megide Deportivo de La Coruña.
Na nkwupụta nke klọb Galatasaray mere na 21 Ọgọstụ 2021, "E meela nkwekọrịta na Charleroi maka mbufe nwa oge nke onye egwuregwu bọọlụ anyị bụ Ozornwafor maka otu afọ
Anyị na-atụ anya ka onye egwuregwu anyị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na klọb ọhụrụ ya
Mgbe mgbazinye ahụ gasịrị, Charleroi nwetara ikike Ozornwafor ma gbazinye ya Sochaux na France na 8 Julaị 2022.

Ozornwafor nọchitere anya Naijiria n'okpuru afọ 20 na 2019 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations na 2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup. A kpọrọ ya na mbụ n'akụkụ zuru ezu na Machị 2019, maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Seychelles na Egypt, mana ọ bụ naanị onye nnọchi anya a na-ejighị mee ihe. Ọ malitere na Naịjirịa na mmeri enyi na enyi na Cameroon na 4 June 2021.
